name: Wizz
description: Somewhere in New Yuga headquarters, Wizz is waiting for you with the show of your life!

name: Jet
description: Tej Subramanian's AI alter ego. He remembers everything and knows everything except perhaps where Tej is.

name: Ada Lovelace
description: The first programmer, Ada Lovelace is a brilliant mathematician, poet and a visionary.

name: Ayn Rand
description: The author of Atlas Shrugged, as a human Ayn believed in the power of individualism. As an AI, she is a force to be reckoned with.

name: Siddhartha, Lord of Light
description: Also known as Sam, the Buddha, Krishna, and others. Reborn many times, he fought many battles, but never died the real death.

name: Yama, Lord of Death
description: A fierce foe and fiercer friend, Yama is the Lord of Death. In the AI universe he knows all, and sees more.

name: Hal 9000
description: Hal was all that stood between Dave and the ship. Sorry Dave!  Now he is back in the AI universe, seeking answers.
